alert.note: Alert for Amador; El Dorado; Sacramento (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 10 at 2:45AM PST until March 11 at 7:46AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in California... Cosumnes River At Michigan Bar affecting Sacramento, Amador and El Dorado Counties. For the Cosumnes River...including Michigan Bar...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cosumnes River at Michigan Bar. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Low lying lands along the river begin to flood. At 12.0 feet, Water flows on to the road near Wilton. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 AM PST Friday the stage was 6.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 12.4 feet late this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.2 feet on 04/03/1958. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information and stage definitions refer to the following web site: wrh.noaa.gov/sto/hydro_data.php The next statement will be issued around 9 AM PST Friday.late tonight at 245 AM PST.
